data.name: Yahtzee VR
data.detailed_description:
Throwing dice and getting high scores. Neither luck nor wit is dispensable on the table.
Don't be shy at a party of such fun and revelry! Go invite your pals over and order a drink. And what goes better with a drinking party than a couple of rounds of dice games with your friends? The collision sound of bouncing dice is just the revive for your drink-blunted mind.



Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Oe a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.

Do the best dice combination in this Yahtzee game.



  • Fast-paced, Competitive and Fun - For Free!
  • One Solo Game Available
  • Awesome Sounds and Graphics
  • Immersive experience with casino gaming environment
  • Beginner-friendly guide

data.short_description: If you think Yahtzee is just a game, l am afraid you are very much mistaken. At a party of such fun and revelry, few rounds of dice game with your friends seems the natural thing to do for bonding relationships. Set up rules and team up to defeat your opponents. May the best prevail!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel®Core™i5－4590 ／ AMD FX™8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA®GeForce®GTX 970，AMD Radeon™R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 / AMD Ryzen 3600 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Only
